subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks were in town on Friday, which meant that Jeff Van Gundy, their former coach and current Rockets coach, was in a familiar position: being hemmed in by a half-dozen reporters from New York.
snippet: The Knicks were in town on Friday, which meant that Jeff Van Gundy, their former coach and current Rockets coach, was in a familiar position: being hemmed in by a half-dozen reporters from New York.
